doc:
Bobbie Beard https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bobbie_Beard 0 Bobbie Beard (August 2, 1930 – October 16, 1999) was an American child actor, best known for portraying "Cotton" in several Our Gang short films from 1932 to 1934. He was a native of Los Angeles, California. His older brother was Matthew "Stymie" Beard, one of the series' most popular and best-remembered characters. Bobbie_Beard ( August_2_,_1930 – October_16_,_1999 ) was an_American_child_actor , best_known for portraying "_Cotton " in several_Our_Gang_short_films from 1932 to 1934 . He was a_native of Los_Angeles , California . His_older_brother was Matthew_"_Stymie_"_Beard , one of the_series_'_most_popular_and_best-remembered_characters .
